description: The [WhisperGate](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0689) third stage can use the AdvancedRun.exe tool to execute commands in the context of the Windows TrustedInstaller group.(Citation: Cisco Ukraine Wipers January 2022)

external_references.description: Biasini, N. et al.. (2022, January 21). Ukraine Campaign Delivers Defacement and Wipers, in Continued Escalation. Retrieved March 14, 2022.
